title.rendered: Job at Peshawar Services Club in August 2024

content.rendered:
Job at Peshawar Services Club in August 2024. Peshawar Services Club invites applications for the Trainer position. Matriculation, Bachelor’s degree, and BA holders are eligible to apply. As part of their responsibilities at the Club, the selected candidates will provide training and other related tasks.

The selected candidate will conduct training sessions, training materials will be developed, and the selected candidate will conduct an evaluation of training programs. We offer competitive salary packages and benefits to the right candidates at the Peshawar Services Club. The application deadline is 10th October 2024. The minimum salary ranges from 25000 to 40000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Human Resources Jobs At Peshawar Services Club in 2024

Date Posted: 10 August, 2024
Last Date: 10 October, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Daily Pakistan Jobs
Education: Matric, Bachelor, BA
Location: Peshawar, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan
Organization: Peshawar Services Club
Job Industry: Human Resource Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

According to an advertisement in the Daily Pakistan Newspaper on August 10, 2024, Peshawar Services Club is seeking applications for the positions of trainer, female trainer, health club trainer, front desk officer, and fitness trainer. There is an advertisement for an open position at the club. Education requirements range from BA, matriculation, and bachelor’s degrees.

Human Resources jobs as well as other government jobs are available at Peshawar Services Club. You can find the exact closing date in the ad, but it is around October 10, 2104, at the latest. Read the full ad online to discover the latest job opportunities at Peshawar Services Club.

Application deadline

Apply by October 10 2024 for a job at Services Club. Come join this prestigious organization and become part of a team dedicated to excellence.
